TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TrackingService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService
Public MustInherit Class TrackingService Inherits WorkflowRuntimeService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供追蹤服務與執行階段追蹤基礎結構之間的基本介面。

span.span: Provides the basic interface between a tracking service and the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 追蹤服務負責為工作流程執行階段引擎提供追蹤通道和追蹤設定檔。A tracking service is responsible for supplying tracking channels and tracking profiles to the workflow run-time engine. 工作流程執行階段引擎會為其具有 的每個工作流程執行個體，向追蹤服務要求一個 。The workflow run-time engine requests one from a tracking service for each workflow instance for which it has a . 工作流程執行階段引擎使用這個 ，傳送與該工作流程執行個體相關聯的追蹤記錄。The workflow run-time engine uses this to send tracking records associated with that workflow instance. 包含追蹤點，這些追蹤點會指定一組追蹤事件，而執行階段追蹤基礎結構必須為這組事件傳送追蹤記錄。A contains track points that specify a set of tracking events for which the run-time tracking infrastructure should send tracking records. 也可以指定在這些追蹤事件的其中之一發生時，要從工作流程執行個體中擷取的資料。A may also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance when one of these tracking events occurs. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構使用 ，篩選由工作流程執行個體發出的追蹤事件。The run-time tracking infrastructure uses a to filter tracking events emitted by a workflow instance. 當發出與 中的追蹤點相符的追蹤事件時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會從工作流程執行個體擷取任何在 中指定的資料，並將此資料與追蹤事件的相關資訊封裝在追蹤記錄中。When a tracking event is emitted that matches a track point in the , the run-time tracking infrastructure extracts any data specified in the from the workflow instance and encapsulates this data and information about the tracking event in a tracking record. 然後透過與工作流程執行個體關聯的 傳送此追蹤記錄。This tracking record is then sent over the associated with the workflow instance. 追蹤記錄可能是下列其中一種：A tracking record may be one of the following kinds: 主應用程式可以使用它所選擇的任何方法使用追蹤記錄。The host application can use the tracking record in any way that it chooses. 例如，主應用程式可以在資料庫中儲存追蹤資訊，然後用來實作複雜的使用者介面，或者可以使用資訊通知系統管理員有關需要採取動作的情況。For example, the host application may store the tracking information in a database and use it to implement a sophisticated user interface, or it may use the information to inform an administrator of a condition that requires some action. 您可以透過呼叫 ，或將適當項目加入應用程式組態檔中，向工作流程執行階段引擎註冊追蹤服務。You can register a tracking service with the workflow run-time engine by calling or by including the appropriate entry in the application configuration file. 所有追蹤服務必須繼承自 抽象類別。All tracking services must inherit from the abstract class. 此類別定義追蹤服務與執行階段追蹤基礎結構之間的基本介面。This class defines the basic interface between a tracking service and the run-time tracking infrastructure. 工作流程執行階段引擎透過呼叫其中一個多載的 方法或 方法，來要求特定工作流程執行個體或工作流程 的 。The workflow run-time engine requests a for a specific workflow instance or workflow by calling one of the overloaded methods or the method. 工作流程執行階段引擎會呼叫 ，要求 。The workflow run-time engine calls to request a . 每當建立或從持續性存放區載入工作流程執行個體時，工作流程追蹤執行階段都會呼叫 和 。The workflow tracking runtime calls the and methods whenever a workflow instance is created or loaded from the persistence store. 對追蹤服務而言，與這些呼叫關聯的負荷可能會耗用大量資源 (例如，可能會有許多對資料庫的呼叫)。The overhead associated with these calls can be costly to the tracking service (many database calls, for example). 您可以在您的追蹤服務中實作 介面以規避這種呼叫式機制，並使用事件通知工作流程執行階段引擎有關 的變更。You can implement the interface in your tracking service to circumvent this call-based mechanism and use events to notify the workflow runtime engine of changes to a . 對於實作 介面的追蹤服務，工作流程執行階段引擎會訂閱 和 事件。For tracking services that implement the interface, the workflow run-time engine subscribes to the and events. 您的追蹤事件可以在它的其中一個追蹤設定檔變更時引發適當的事件。Your tracking service can raise the appropriate event when a change to one of its tracking profiles occurs. 類別會實作這個介面。The class implements this interface. 在主機或服務於工作流程執行個體上明確呼叫 之後，工作流程執行階段引擎會呼叫 方法，測試 是否已變更或移除。The workflow run-time engine calls the method to test whether a has been updated or removed as a result of an explicit call by a host or a service to on a workflow instance. 此處理序可以讓主機或服務動態變更正在用於特定工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。This process enables a host or service to dynamically change the tracking profile that is being used for a specific workflow instance.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立 `TerminationTrackingService` 物件的新執行個體，這個物件的型別衍生自 `TrackingService`。The following example shows how to create a new instance of a `TerminationTrackingService` object, of a type that derives from `TrackingService`. 這個範例來自＜終止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This sample is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#111)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#111)]

summary.span: 必須在衍生類別中覆寫，在實作之後會取得指定之工作流程執行個體或工作流程類型的追蹤設定檔。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, gets the tracking profile for a specified workflow instance or workflow type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤服務負責管理用於特定工作流程類型和特定工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 您可使用您選擇的任何方式來實作這項管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以針對每個工作流程 和工作流程執行個體傳回相同的 ，或者您也可以管理由工作流程執行個體、工作流程 和 所參考之追蹤設定檔的複雜存放區。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile GetProfile (Guid workflowInstanceId);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile GetProfile(valuetype System.Guid workflowInstanceId) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function GetProfile (workflowInstanceId As Guid) As TrackingProfile
protected public: abstract System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::TrackingProfile ^ GetProfile(Guid workflowInstanceId);
abstract member GetProfile : Guid -> System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile

span.span: The of the workflow instance.

summary.span: 必須在衍生類別中覆寫，在實作之後會傳回指定之工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。

span.span: Must be overridden in the derived class, and when implemented, returns the tracking profile for the specified workflow instance.

returns.span: 指定之工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。

span.span: The tracking profile for the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤服務負責管理用於特定工作流程類型和特定工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 您可使用您選擇的任何方式來實作這項管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以針對每個工作流程 和工作流程執行個體傳回相同的 ，或者您也可以管理由工作流程執行個體、工作流程 和 所參考之追蹤設定檔的複雜存放區。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and . ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `GetProfile` 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the `GetProfile` method. 在這個範例中，數個 `GetProfile` 方法的多載會呼叫單一私用 `GetProfile` 方法，這個方法則會傳回硬式編碼的預設追蹤設定檔。In this example, several overloads of the `GetProfile` method call a single private `GetProfile` method, which returns a hard-coded, default tracking profile. 這個範例來自＜暫止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#115](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#115)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#115](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#115)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤服務負責管理用於特定工作流程類型和特定工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 您可使用您選擇的任何方式來實作這項管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以針對每個工作流程 和工作流程執行個體傳回相同的 ，或者您也可以管理由工作流程執行個體、工作流程 和 所參考之追蹤設定檔的複雜存放區。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and .

summary.span: 必須在衍生類別中覆寫，在實作之後會傳回執行階段追蹤基礎結構用於傳送追蹤記錄至追蹤服務的通道。

returns.span: 用於傳送追蹤記錄至追蹤服務的 。

span.span: The that is used to send tracking records to the tracking service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會為所有工作流程執行個體的每個追蹤服務使用一個 。The run-time tracking infrastructure uses one for each tracking service for each workflow instance. 工作流程執行階段引擎會在每個追蹤服務上呼叫 ，取得用於該服務的 。The workflow run-time engine calls on each tracking service to get the for that service. 您可以使用 中傳遞的資訊，關聯追蹤服務 上傳送的追蹤資料與特定的根工作流程執行個體。You can use the information passed in to associate tracking data sent on the for your tracking service with a particular root workflow instance. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `GetTrackingChannel` 方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the `GetTrackingChannel` method. 這個範例來自＜暫止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤服務負責管理用於特定工作流程類型和特定工作流程執行個體的追蹤設定檔。A tracking service is responsible for managing the tracking profiles available for specific workflow types and specific workflow instances. 您可使用您選擇的任何方式來實作這項管理。You can implement this management in whatever manner you choose. 例如，您可以針對每個工作流程 和工作流程執行個體傳回相同的 ，或者您也可以管理由工作流程執行個體、工作流程 和 所參考之追蹤設定檔的複雜存放區。For example, you can return the same for every workflow and workflow instance; or you can manage a sophisticated store of tracking profiles referenced by workflow instance, workflow , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範 `TryGetProfile` 方法的實作，這個方法會呼叫私用 `GetProfile` 方法。The following example demonstrates an implementation of the `TryGetProfile` method, which calls a private `GetProfile` method. 這個範例來自＜暫止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫 ，判斷是否必須為指定的工作流程執行個體載入新的 。 is called by the run-time tracking infrastructure to determine whether a new should be loaded for the specified workflow instance. 如果需要新的 ，會在 `profile` 中回。If a new is required, it is returned in `profile`. 如果要執行階段追蹤基礎結構停止追蹤工作流程執行個體，您的追蹤服務應傳回 `true`，並將 `profile` 設定為等於 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。If you want the run-time tracking infrastructure to stop tracking a workflow instance, your tracking service should return `true` and set `profile` equal to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 您的追蹤服務可以依您選擇的任何方法使用 `workflowType` 或 `workflowInstanceId`，判斷是否應重新載入追蹤設定檔。Your tracking service can use `workflowType` or `workflowInstanceId` in whatever manner you choose to determine whether a tracking profile should be reloaded. 例如， 僅使用 `workflowInstanceId` 決定是否應重新載入追蹤設定檔。For example, the only uses `workflowInstanceId` to decide whether the tracking profile should be reloaded. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會根據本身的追蹤語意，或回應呼叫工作流程執行個體上 的主機或服務來呼叫 。 is called by the run-time tracking infrastructure according to its own tracking semantics, or in response to the host or a service calling on a workflow instance. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `TryReloadProfile` 方法的基本實作。The following example shows a basic implementation of the `TryReloadProfile` method. 這個範例來自＜暫止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#116](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#116)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#116](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#116)]
